name: END POVERTY
briefDescription: End Poverty, is an implementing organisation, registered under the Haryana Registration and Regulation of Societies Act 2010 and based in Gurgaon, Haryana. End Poverty works in the Tijara Block of the Alwar District of Rajasthan State with the prime objective of alleviating poverty within that area to address the needs of the most disadvantaged villagers, particularly the Meo Muslim population.
